temple_info.historical_significance: The place was called Venkata Samudhram in olden days
temple_info.mythology: A courtesan named Chandralegai meditated and Lord Shiva appeared in her dream
unique_features: Ganesha festival takes place for ten days
Devotees offer Kozhukattai to Ganesha on Vinayakachathurthi
